content: sfocato beanie 1 jenny noto / wanded knit and crochet sfocato beanie celebrate a world of color with laines du nord fashion mohair sfocato means blurred in italian and this is the illusion the mohair creates this yarn has some bulk to it which surprised me as i m used to working with mohair that s lace weight this is a bulky weight yarn as is just one ball creates a fun striped beanie that s warm and very light weight keeping it simple is the key here so i ve written this basic beanie pattern that is beginner friendly there are 3 sizes to choose from but even more options are available if you are confident to change needle sizes please read all the way through before starting skill level beginner copyright © wanded knit and crochet 2024 all photos and instructions are property of wanded knit and crochet please do not publish or share this patter n as your own you may make and sell items using this pattern but please give credit to jenny noto/ wanded knit and crochet sfocato beanie 2 materials laines du nord fashion mohair - 1 ball us 9/ 5 5mm 16 circular needles us 10/ 6mm 16 circular needles and/or dpns or longer cord for magic loop method * stitch marker * tapestry needle * scissors gauges 4 x 4 stockinette in the round on larger needles worsted 14 stitches x 16 rounds finished sizes s m l/ xl width measured flat ~8 ~9 ~10 abbreviations co - cast on k - knit p - purl pm - place marker dpn - double pointed needles bor - beginning of round k2tog - knit 2 together st s - stitch es - repeat what is between the brackets notes ● pattern is written for 3 basic sizes s m/ l/xl respectively ● pattern can be adjusted using multiples of 8 ● this is a loosely fitted beanie if a more fitted style is desired adjust needle sizes accordingly or the cast on number ● please check gauge prior to beginning to determine the type of fabric desired ● if knitting this for a child or teen make sure to shorten the total length as well for a better fit ● special note other mohair yarns are typically labeled lace weight so will not work for this pattern as a single strand copyright © wanded knit and crochet 2024 all photos and instructions are property of wanded knit and crochet please do not publish or share this patter n as your own you may make and sell items using this pattern but please give credit to jenny noto/ wanded knit and crochet sfocato beanie 3 pattern brim with us 9/5 5mm 16 circular needles co 56 64 72 using the long tail method or your preferred method join in the round and place bor marker r1-9 k2 p2 to marker change to larger needles body knit in stockinette st until desired length from cast
